snippet: President Obama’s immigration policies, including an increase in deportations, have produced few gains among Latinos.
abstract: News analysis; Pres Obama's immigration policies, including an increase in deportations, have produced few gains among Latinos, a key demographic that he must win in order to win re-election; Latinos have been particularly disappointed by the administration's effort to rein in deportations of non-criminal illegal immigrants, which has largely failed to produce results.
lead_paragraph: President Obama’s immigration policies, including an increase in deportations, have produced few gains among Latinos.

headline.seo: Obama Faces a Frustrated Hispanic Electorate
headline.main: While Seeking Support, Obama Faces a Frustrated Hispanic Electorate
headline.print_headline: While Seeking Support, Obama Faces a Frustrated Hispanic Electorate

keywords.value: Dream Act (Development, Relief and Education for Minors Act)
